participant_1.background:
I treasure my collection of vintage horror movies, which I love to watch with my grandchildren.
i love to go outside at night and eavesdrop on my neighbors arguments.
i like fitness.
I love adrenaline rushes and pushing myself to the limit.
i moved to ny to study in a prestigious designing school.

participant_2.background:
I'm spending the weekend working on a new 3D model for a video game.
I enjoy doing DIY projects in my free time, especially drywall work.
i like to eat pizza.
i am recent college graduate looking for a job in marketing.
my wife stays home with our kids.

content.text: What are you up to this weekend?
Nothing much, just some DIY projects.
Sounds fun. I'm spending the weekend working on a new 3D model for a video game.
Oh cool! Are you a video game designer?
I'm a recent college graduate looking for a job in marketing, but I love doing 3D modeling in my free time.
That's awesome. I'm a recent college graduate too, but I'm still looking for a job in marketing.
I've been applying all over the place, but I haven't had any luck yet.
Keep trying! I'm sure you'll find something soon.
No problem. So, what do you like to do in your free time?
I like to do DIY projects, play video games, and eat pizza.
Sounds like we have a lot in common. I like to do DIY projects, play video games, and eat pizza too.
That's awesome! We should hang out sometime.
